title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the versatile **Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse** - a perfect blend of functionality and comfort. This trackball mouse is designed to cater to both left-handed and right-handed users, ensuring an optimal user experience for all.

With its sleek design and a choice of colors including red, gray, and white, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is not just a functional device but also a stylish addition to your desktop setup. The mouse measures 7 inches in length, 4 inches in width, and 2.5 inches in height, making it compact and easy to handle.

This mouse features a high-precision trackball for smooth and accurate cursor control, along with side-to-side scrolling capabilities for enhanced navigation. It comes with two buttons for convenient clicking, making it a breeze to use for both work and play.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse offers versatile connectivity options, supporting both PS/2 and USB interfaces. With a DPI of 300, this mouse ensures precise tracking and control.

Crafted with care in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is a testament to Logitech's commitment to quality and innovation. Experience the comfort and precision of trackball navigation with this exceptional device. Order yours today!
